title: An NSB Wedding
description: All the pieces are in place. All the players, assembled. The Wedding of the Century is locked and loaded.Too bad nothing’s fair in love, rock, and wedding planning.I've been ready to marry Callie since the day I spotted her in that diner.After the hell we’ve survived since then, we deserve the mother of all HEAs.But fate's doing everything to keep us from walking down the aisle.Guess we should have seen it coming.Three rock bands, two days to "I do," and one impending world tour aren't exactly the ingredients for a peaceful special day.Did we expect anything less from An NSB Wedding?NSB Wedding concludes The Hold Me Series with a touching (and at times hilarious) tribute to love in all its forms and to the people who make life worth living.
author: Alyson Santos
